title: Study of a Lioness
credit_line: Gift of Dr. and Mrs. Daniel Fishkoff
provenance_text:
Charles Edme Saint-Marcel-Cabin [1819-1890], Fontainebleau, France [1]. Dr. and Mrs. Daniel Fishkoff, Colonia, NJ, by June 12, 1974 [1]; their gift to Museum of Art, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, December 1975.

Notes:
[1]. The artist's studio stamp (L. 2257) is on the lower left of the drawing.
[2]. Daniel and Jane Fishkoff loaned the work to the Museum of Art, Carnegie Institute in June 1974; see curatorial file for original loan form and list of works.
